name: grocery-saas
description: Multi-tenant SaaS grocery management system with inventory, sales, receipts, reports, subscriptions, and role-based access (SaaS Admin, Owner, Accountant, Attendant) powered by Node.js, Grist API, and a Bootstrap/Tailwind frontend.

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: cd public && npm install && npm run build
